en.title: When is the deadline for the exercises and the exam?
text: The deadline for the exercises will be posted on Canvas.  The deadline for the exam is also on Canvas.

en.title: How do I submit the exercises?
text: The exercises are submitted through GitHub and marking them as done on Canvas. You can read more from here.

en.title: Do I have to submit each part to a separate repository?
text: No. You can use one or more repositories, most important is to name everything in a repository clearly.

en.title: Can I edit a submission?
text: No. All exercises for a part must be submitted at the same time. If you marked exercises wrong by accident, or wrote the repository name wrong, message me or your TA on Discord, tell your GitHub username and how the submission should be edited.
